Pages.Title: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the last financial year?
Pages.LinkTitle: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the last financial year?

Questions.Label: Was your organisation's total annual turnover over £75 million for the last financial year?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation's total annual turnover was over £75 million for the last financial year

Pages.BodyText:
You can find your organisation's total annual turnover on its:

  • 'profit and loss statement'
  • 'income and expenditure account'
  • 'statement of financial activities'

Pages.Title: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?
Pages.LinkTitle: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?

Questions.Label: Does your organisation expect its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation expects its funding from ESFA to be less than 5% of its total annual turnover

Pages.BodyText:
We'll check your organisation's financial statements to confirm your answer.

If your answer is incorrect, we may ask you to provider further financial information for your organisation.

Details.Title: Show me an example
Details.Body:
Your organisation's total annual turnover is £80 million and it expects to receive £3 million of funding from the ESFA.

This is less than 5% of its total annual turnover, so the answer is yes.

Pages.Title: Financial evidence

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total annual turnover for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'profit and loss statement', 'income and expenditure account' or 'statement of financial activities'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total annual turnover for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total depreciation and amortisation charges for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total depreciation and amortisation charges for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's profit or loss for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: Profit or loss is the net amount earned after tax.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's profit or loss for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total dividends for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'notes to the accounts'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total dividends for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total current assets for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total current assets for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total current liabilities for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet'

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total current liabilities for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total borrowings for the last financial year
Questions.Hint:
You will need to add up a total of:
  • bank overdraft
  • loans
  • amounts owed to directors - including director loans and director accounts
  • amounts owed to subsidiaries - if your organisation is part of a group
  • amounts due under finance leases or hire purchase contracts

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total borrowings for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's net assets for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet'

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's net assets for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total intangible assets for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet' under 'fixed assets' or 'goodwill'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total intangible assets for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Pages.BodyText: For negative numbers, use a negative value. For example, '-1000'.

Pages.Title: Financial evidence

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total annual turnover for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'profit and loss statement', 'income and expenditure account' or 'statement of financial activities'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total annual turnover for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total depreciation and amortisation charges for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'operating profit note to the accounts'. You'll need to add up all the items under 'note 2' and enter the total figure.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total depreciation and amortisation charges for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's profit or loss for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: Profit or loss is the net amount earned after tax. You can find this under your organisation's 'profit and loss statement' or under 'net profit' or 'net movement in funds' in its accounts.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's profit or loss for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total dividends for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'notes to the accounts'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total dividends for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total current assets for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total current assets for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total current liabilities for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet' under 'creditors: amount falling due within one year'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total current liabilities for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total borrowings for the last financial year
Questions.Hint:
You will need to add up a total of:
  • bank overdraft
  • loans
  • amounts owed to directors - including director loans and director accounts
  • amounts owed to subsidiaries - if your organisation is part of a group
  • amounts due under finance leases or hire purchase contracts

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total borrowings for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's net assets for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet' under 'the sum of all assets less all liabilities'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's net assets for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Questions.Label: Enter your organisation's total intangible assets for the last financial year
Questions.Hint: You can find this on your organisation's 'balance sheet' under 'fixed assets' or 'goodwill'.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter your organisation's total intangible assets for the last financial year

Validations.Name: Regex
Validations.ErrorMessage: Enter a figure using numbers only. For example, 1300000

Pages.BodyText: For negative numbers, use a negative value. For example, '-1000'.
